t: Amazon.com: Gold Bond 8" All Cotton Futon Mattress, Duct, Full, Black : Home & Kitchen
s: Was trying to find something more in the style of 90s futons, instead of the memory foam crap, and this exceeds expectations. I might have preferred the 6in for 'couch mode' but it'll probably compress in a month. The tag on the mattress lists 81% cotton, 11% poly foam, 8% wool.

t: Amazon.com: Gold Bond 8" Double Foam & Futon Mattress, Natural, Twin, Natural : Home & Kitchen
s: 8" double foam & cotton #611 Twin Natural futon mattress, medium firm surface feel. This mattress has two layers of solid 1 1/2" foam for resiliency, cushioning and comfort. The cotton and foam is pre-compressed under maximum pressure while the tufts are installed.

t: Amazon.com: Gold Bond 4" All Cotton Futon Mattress, Duct, King, Black : Home & Kitchen
s: 4" All Cotton #604 King Black Duct Futon Mattress has a firm surface feel. The All Cotton has more densely packed cotton inside for durability and firmness. Gold Bond uses a custom-blended "JOY" cotton batting for resilience and longevity. This is the perfect starter futon mattress.

t: Amazon.com: Gold Bond 8" Wool Wrap Futon Mattress, Duct, Full, Black : Home & Kitchen
s: 8" wool wrap #613 Full black duct futon mattress, extra firm surface feel. This mattress brings together cotton and wool for pure comfort and insulating properties. The Wool Wrap has a plush 2" thick layer of superior New Zealand virgin wool surrounding two layers of foam.

s: The 6" futon flattens pretty quickly in the areas of use. It is "firm" in that it flattens to more of a cushion over whatever structure you are on.
